body:
@notriddle this is a problem we see commonly in our CI. It is something that would be a good match for bors-ng/bors-ng#157. We do full builds of Firefox, which rely on keeping an up-to-date version of Rust. Our build image is static, so about every 6 weeks we have to kick it to update Rust.

There may be a better solution to this, in the form of figuring out why rustup can't update itself, but I haven't looked into it yet.
